Header.title: Welcome to StartCom
Header.paragraph: StartCom gives you a chance to express your ideas to the ever-growing world and also to become part of this community.

About.paragraph: Startcom is a website started in 2020 by five engineering students. This website enables students to express their ideas and interact with the ever-growing community. Users can share different posts and thoughts which allows the followers to react and comment to their posts.

Services.name: Groups
Services.text: User can colloborate with another user by forming groups if he/she likes the idea

Services.name: Connectivity
Services.text: This platform helps to connect Startup aspirants

Services.name: Privacy
Services.text: Everyone has their own privacy about their ideas and information

Services.name: Individuality
Services.text: Each individual has their own pertained account

Services.name: Community
Services.text: join the best community to nurture your idea

Services.name: Pages
Services.text: User can create pages and express their ideas efficiently with the help of images, links etc..

Contact.address: 630, Gnan Marg Sri City, Sathyavedu, Andhra Pradesh 517646

Features.title: Chat interface
Features.text: You can easily chat with different peers across the world and discuss your startup ideas efficiently

Features.title: Interactivity
Features.text: you can follow different people to know and travel along with them and get to know about their thoughts.

Features.title: Posts
Features.text: you can post your ideas with some captions which allows your followers to react and comment to the posts.

Features.title: Security
Features.text: Operate your profile as your wish but there will be no compromise in the security
